DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety preliminary efficacy two formulation Latanoprost-PPDS subject ocular hypertension open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Different Formulations L-PPDS Subjects With OH OAG
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 year age diagnose ocular hypertension openangle glaucoma Subjects best correct visual acuity 20/100 good Subjects wear contact lenses Subjects uncontrolled medical condition Subjects require chronic topical artificial tear , lubricant , and/or require chronic ocular topical medication Subjects history chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease
